9 namespace vistle {

11 template<typename Vector, typename TraitsT = std::char_traits<typename Vector::value_type>>
12 class vecostreambuf: public std::basic_streambuf<typename Vector::value_type, TraitsT> {
13 
14  public:
15  vecostreambuf() {
16  }
17 
18  int overflow(int ch) {
19  if (ch != EOF) {
20  m_vector.push_back(ch);
21  return 0;
22  } else {
23  return EOF;
24  }
25  }
26 
27  std::streamsize xsputn (const typename Vector::value_type*s, std::streamsize num) {
28  size_t oldsize = m_vector.size();
29  if (oldsize+num > m_vector.capacity()) {
30  m_vector.reserve(std::max(2*(oldsize+num), m_vector.capacity()*2));
31  }
32  m_vector.resize(oldsize+num);
33  memcpy(m_vector.data()+oldsize, s, num);
34  return num;
35  }
36 
37  std::size_t write(const void *ptr, std::size_t size) {
38  return xsputn(static_cast<const typename Vector::value_type*>(ptr), size);
39  }
40 
41  const Vector &get_vector() const {
42  return m_vector;
43  }
44 
45  Vector &get_vector() {
46  return m_vector;
47  }
48 
49  private:
50  Vector m_vector;
51 };
52 
53 
54 
55 
56 template<typename Vector, typename TraitsT = std::char_traits<typename Vector::value_type>>
57 class vecistreambuf : public std::basic_streambuf<typename Vector::value_type, TraitsT> {
58 public:
59  vecistreambuf(const Vector& ve) : vec(ve) {
60 
61  auto& v = const_cast<Vector&>(vec);
62  this->setg(v.data(), v.data(), v.data() + v.size());
63  }
64 
65  std::size_t read(void* ptr, std::size_t size) {
66  if (cur + size > vec.size())
67  size = vec.size() - cur;
68  memcpy(ptr, vec.data() + cur, size);
69  cur += size;
70  return size;
71  }
72 
73  bool empty() const { return cur == 0; }
74  typename Vector::value_type peekch() const { return vec[cur]; }
75  typename Vector::value_type getch() { return vec[cur++]; }
76  void ungetch(char) { if (cur > 0) --cur; }
77 
78 private:
79  const Vector& vec;
80  size_t cur = 0;
81 };
82

84 
85 } // namespace vistle
